description.en_US: Toss an explosive spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Summon a sentry card at your cursor position that shoots at a nearby enemy.
Shoot a wide arc of unenchanted spell cards.
Summon a more powerful sentry card at your cursor position.
Slow-traveling, piercing variant of Hive Missile that releases bees as it travels.
Use an ancient magic to throw rocks at your cursor position.
Hit a single enemy to inflict them with \c[3]poison\c[0].
Dash and leave behind a mine that will deploy after a brief arming period. Deals extreme knockback.
Sacrifice \c[1]25%\c[0] of your HP to make your attacks inflict \c[3]poison\c[0] for a short time.
Draw enemies in before stunning them with a blinding attack. The stun lasts long enough to allow combo follow-ups.
Toss a fire-spewing spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Toss a RANGED damage version of Meteor Flare at your cursor position.
Toss a RANGED damage version of Meteor Flare at your cursor position.
Place a mine with a wide trigger and attack radius.
Toss an icicle spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Hit enemies to apply \c[1]-95%\c[0] focus, causing vulnerability to crits and status buildup.
Move forward while blasting enemies in front of you with a snowstorm.
Lateral Sublimation except it's front/back.
Toss a Jolt Hex spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Throw a projectile that chases an enemy before striking with a lightning bolt.
Throw a projectile that slowly seeks an enemy before moving in for a final strike.
Activate an aura that passively shoots lightning bolts at nearby enemies.
Toss a toxic mire spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Toss a healing spell card aimed at your cursor position. \c[3]Only heals allies.\c[0]
Shoot a wide spread of bubbles that slow enemies on hit.
Fire a more powerful laser and leave a lingering sentry card which continues to fire at enemies.
Toss a temporal miasma spell card aimed at your cursor position.
Summon a powerful tornado that chases after enemies.
Hit an ally in front of you to heal them a large amount.
Draw in enemies before triggering a large explosion.
Enter an ethereal state to recover \c[2]+20%\c[0] of your HP and heal status conditions. This process will leave you \c[1]slowed\c[0] for a period afterwards.
